description: Minecraft is a popular cross-platform game where you can break and place blocks in order to build structures and explore the virtual world. Because of its popularity, a variety of users have developed mods to alter the gameplay of Minecraft. The Hardcore Questing Mode mod allows you to play in multiplayer hardcore mode in Minecraft but with more than just 1 life, which keeps your world from being deleted and protects you from getting banned from a server when you die.

common_filenames.description: quests.hqm - The default filename created to store quest data. The quests.hqm file is stored in your mod folder along with the hqmconfig.cfg file, which contains configuration data.
